title: Replays on Beta Client
body: The beta client gives us the option to download our replays and replay them via the match history menu, however the replays are saved in our Documents folder but require the client to open the replay. When the match is no longer on match history is there some other way to get the client to open the replay?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Not that I'm currently aware of, however this does sound like a good suggestion.

Why not make a thread over in the [Client Discussion](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client) board.
